      void ModelBase.copy(ModelBase other) 
      com.fuse.cms.ModelFollower Model.follow(ModelBase source)
      Create a 'follow connection' between this model and the specified source model, with the default null owner.
      com.fuse.cms.ModelFollower Model.follow(ModelBase source, Object owner)
      Create a 'follow connection' between this model and the specified source model, and give the connection a specific owner.
      com.fuse.cms.ModelFollower Model.follow(ModelBase source, Object owner, boolean active)
      Create a 'follow connection' between this model and the specified source model, give the connection a specific owner, and specify if the the connection should be active (also listening to future changes to the source model) or one-time only (just copy the current attributes).
